title: Help Identify This Sans Serif
content:
[https://m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/102046023/disp/01b7b04cfad966d7...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/https:/m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/102046023/disp/01b7b04cfad966d7bf2b202caab270ba.jpg "https://m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/102046023/disp/01b7b04cfad966d7bf2b202caab270ba.jpg")

[https://m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/102046011/disp/0dbc2ecead22b81a...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/https:/m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/102046011/disp/0dbc2ecead22b81af2c13ae4dc2fcb8f.jpg "https://m1.behance.net/rendition/modules/102046011/disp/0dbc2ecead22b81af2c13ae4dc2fcb8f.jpg")

Please assist me in identifying this typeface.

Thanks

SG

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0dbc2ecead22b81af2c13ae4dc2fcb8f.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/typophile.com/files/0dbc2ecead22b81af2c13ae4dc2fcb8f_0.jpg) | 39.13 KB |
author: steve.gridlock

comments.content: Are you referring to the secondary font on the business cards? That's the only sans serif I see in the pic and the reference image is very small.

I've incorporated 2 images on top. And yes the secondary font on the business cards!

Thanks Josev

Close Up  
Secondary sans serif font on business card.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01b7b04cfad966d7bf2b202caab270ba_4624.jpg)
.

Pretty convinced is completely custom. [Anagrama](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.anagrama.com/portafolio/161-very) may have started with a ' [Didone](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Adidone)' but to me, it has been too much modified to positively identify it.  
Here's anyway a list of alternatives needing (more or less) customization: [PF Regal Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.parachute.gr/typefaces/allfonts/regal-display-pro) Black, [ITC Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/tiffany) Black, [Caslon Graphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/caslon+graphique), [Lust](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/lust), [Acta Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-poster), [4F Model](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/model-4f), [Carousel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/carousel-lt), [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/didoni), [Austin Hairline](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin/hairline), [Grumpy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suomi/grumpy) Black 99  
Another selection, all "contrated to stencil": **[Dala Floda](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala_floda)** (my choice mainly redrawing /R leg and /E crossbars), [Caslon Fina Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/applyinteractive/caslon-fina-stencil/)**, [Sensaway](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/gestalten/sensaway_pro_heavy/)** (good option too)

Thanks for the response but i wasn't referring to the primary logo typeface. Was just looking for the SECOND SANS SERIF typeface (which lists all the contact information)??

Thanks

SG

Looks like a weight of Trade Gothic  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804133852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/")
